item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

We are looking for few dog owners with their dogs for a Press meet and photo shoot for the Doggy Fun Run.

Learn more about this project: www.doggyfunrun.org

If you interested, please feel free to dress up your dog for the photo shoot. The following New agencies will be there:

  1. Boston Globe
  2. Medford Transcript
  3. Boston News Group
  4. Inside Medford and Medford Public Schools
  5. Medford Daily Mercury
  6. Medford Patch
  7. Metro News

We are looking for volunteers with their dogs to be part of the photo shoot. We are actively looking for these people:

  1. Fast runner with their dog
  2. Slow runner or walker with their dog
  3. A dog dressed up
  4. Dog with their family

The address for the park is not in the maps. Take a left before 97 Locust street, follow the road till John J MC Glynn Elementary school and we will be there.

Please call me if you have any questions at 505-301-6872

Thank you and see you soon.

Phani

The Boston Volunteers

Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Cancelled -Press meet and photo shoot with major News Agencies-Doggy Fun Run
